channel.title: (718/***) Monkey Greegree
channel.description:
I've set it up if you wield it, however it won't allow me to equip the item, I've added it into equipment.java as listed as a weapon. But still doesn't allow me to equip the item.
Also added it Into completedump.java,
So my issues are;
- Can't equip item - How to transform back if the item is no longer in weapon slot
